data.name: â€‹Our Life: Beginnings & Always - Voiced Name Expansion
data.detailed_description: Download a collection of extra preset names for the protagonist that come with voice acting! You'll be able to hear the love interest, Cove Holden, say your name of choice out loud. This DLC adds over 600 voiced names to choose from.
data.about_the_game: Download a collection of extra preset names for the protagonist that come with voice acting! You'll be able to hear the love interest, Cove Holden, say your name of choice out loud. This DLC adds over 600 voiced names to choose from.
data.short_description: Download a collection of preset names for the protagonist that come with voice acting!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP and newer
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 900 MB RAM
